mission: Family Guy news breakdown. Maryam (makeup smeared) announces: 'Celebrating 1000 days without Instagram! Citizens report strange symptoms: actual conversations.' Show Meg-style teenager: 'I had to... talk to my parents. THE HORROR!' Cleveland-style IT minister: 'Internet is overrated. Try smoke signals!' Cutaway: Pigeons carrying USB drives. News ticker: 'BREAKING: Youth Discover Books Exist'. Lower third: 'COMING UP: How to Like Things Without a Button'. Studio lights flicker. Maryam drinks from flask.

script_processing.original_script: [VISUAL: Maryam, makeup smeared, stands at a news desk. Studio lights flicker.] DIALOGUE: Celebrating 1000 days without Instagram! Citizens report strange symptoms: actual conversations. [VISUAL: Meg-style teenager appears.] DIALOGUE: I had to... talk to my parents. THE HORROR! [VISUAL: Cleveland-style IT minister gestures enthusiastically.] DIALOGUE: Internet is overrated. Try smoke signals! [VISUAL: Cutaway of pigeons carrying USB drives. News ticker reads: 'BREAKING: Youth Discover Books Exist'.] DIALOGUE: Astonishing discoveries are being made. [VISUAL: Lower third appears: 'COMING UP: How to Like Things Without a Button'. Maryam drinks from a flask.] DIALOGUE: Next, we learn to appreciate life offline.
script_processing.final_script: Celebrating one thousand days without Instagram! Citizens report unusual symptoms: actual conversations. I had to speak with my parents. The horror! Internet overuse is a real problem. Smoke signals offer a charming alternative. Astonishing discoveries are being made offline. Next, we learn to appreciate life unplugged. Life offline offers unexpected rewards. Face-to-face interactions are surprisingly fulfilling. The world is full of wonders beyond the screen. Simple pleasures become profoundly meaningful. I rediscovered the joy of reading physical books. The quiet moments are surprisingly enriching. I am more present in my life. I appreciate the small things. This experience has been transformative. My relationships have deepened significantly. I feel a stronger connection to my community. I have a renewed appreciation for nature. I am healthier and happier. I encourage you to try it. Disconnect to reconnect. You might be surprised
